title: Add game instructions and enhance Japanese/Korean game aesthetic

requirements.text: Create a comprehensive tutorial/onboarding system that explains game mechanics including: how to unlock characters, how riddle challenges work, how to view character stories, and how progress tracking functions

quotes: their is clear instructions or guidance

acceptanceCriteria: Tutorial system is accessible from the main game home page
Instructions explain the character unlock system clearly
Riddle challenge mechanics are explained with examples
Progress tracking system is documented for users
Tutorial can be accessed at any time during gameplay

requirements.text: Redesign the UI with enhanced Japanese/Korean game aesthetic featuring: polished anime-style visual effects, refined typography with better hierarchy, modern gradient schemes common in Asian mobile games, and professional-grade spacing and composition while maintaining English language for all text

quotes: very unesthetic look , 1/5 rating i will give to this design
Please make it similar to Japanese or Koreans game but in english

acceptanceCriteria: UI features polished anime-style visual effects and transitions
Typography hierarchy is clear and professional with appropriate font weights and sizes
Color gradients and schemes match modern Japanese/Korean mobile game standards
Spacing and layout composition meet professional game UI standards
All text remains in English language
Overall aesthetic quality significantly improved from current state

requirements.text: Add visual indicators and tooltips throughout the interface to guide users on interactive elements, available actions, and game progression paths

quotes: their is clear instructions or guidance

acceptanceCriteria: Interactive elements have clear hover states and visual feedback
Tooltips explain what actions users can take on each screen
Progress indicators show clear paths to unlock characters
Visual cues highlight important game mechanics and features
First-time users can understand available actions without external documentation

requirements.text: Enhance the character cards with more polished anime-style visual effects including particle effects, glow animations, premium card borders, and dynamic hover states that match Japanese/Korean game quality standards

quotes: Please make it similar to Japanese or Koreans game

acceptanceCriteria: Character cards feature particle effects or animated elements
Premium-looking card borders and frames are implemented
Hover states include dynamic glow or shine effects
Locked and unlocked states have distinct premium visual treatments
Overall card design quality matches Japanese/Korean mobile game standards

requirements.text: Improve the home page layout with a more engaging hero section, better visual hierarchy, and clearer calls-to-action that guide new users through their first interactions

quotes: their is clear instructions or guidance

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is visually engaging with clear primary action
Visual hierarchy clearly distinguishes primary, secondary, and tertiary content

Navigation paths to key features are immediately obvious
Overall layout follows Japanese/Korean game UI conventions

constraints: All text must remain in English language
Preserve existing Internet Identity authentication system
Maintain the 20-character roster and unlock mechanics
Keep the riddle challenge system functional
Do not modify backend character data or unlock logic
nonGoals: Translating any content to Japanese or Korean languages
Adding new game mechanics beyond tutorials and guidance
Changing the core unlock progression system
Modifying character backstories or riddle content
